note: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations license pricing. Customer-overridable per tenant configuration (FR-Agent-1.3). Prices verified February 2026.

team_members.name: Team Members
team_members.description: Self-service scenarios, read-only access to most forms, limited write operations (profile updates, time entry, expense submission)
limitations: Cannot create transactional records (POs, invoices, journal entries)

operations_activity.name: Operations - Activity
operations_activity.description: Add-on for Team Members. Enables activity-based operations (time tracking, project tasks) without full transactional access.

operations.name: Operations
operations.description: Base operational license. Enables transactional operations in single module (Finance OR SCM OR Commerce, not multiple).
capabilities: Full CRUD operations in assigned module
Single module access (Finance OR SCM OR Commerce)

scm.name: SCM
scm.description: Full Supply Chain Management license. Warehouse, inventory, production, procurement.

finance.name: Finance
finance.description: Full Finance license. General ledger, AR, AP, cash management, financial reporting.

commerce.name: Commerce
commerce.description: Full Commerce license. Retail, e-commerce, omnichannel operations.

device.name: Device License
device.description: Shared device license. Unlimited users on a single device (warehouse scanner, POS terminal, kiosk).
device.note: Cost-effective when 3+ users share a device (Phase 2: Algorithm 4.1)

multiLicenseStacking.description: Users can hold multiple licenses. Total cost is sum of all licenses.

savingsCalculation.note: Confidence score based on: data completeness (40%), pattern consistency (30%), edge case handling (30%)

seasonalAwareness.description: FR-Agent-1.4: Adjust recommendations based on fiscal calendars, audit periods, year-end close. See Algorithm 3.4 (doc 06) for seasonal pattern detection.

customerOverrides.description: Customers can override prices for volume licensing agreements, EA discounts, regional pricing variations.

caveats: Team Members form eligibility (TEAM_MEMBERS_ELIGIBLE_FORMS) requires customer validation before production use
Operations Activity form eligibility (OPERATIONS_ACTIVITY_ELIGIBLE_FORMS) requires customer validation
Regional pricing may vary outside USD
